about_the_game:
Have you ever dreamt of running your own dreamy cafe? Now you can turn your dreams into reality with Dream Cafe! Step into the enchanting world of macarons and serve up colorful delights to your discerning customers while managing your very own dream factory. Your goal? To maximize your cafe's Yelp reviews by crafting and delivering macaron orders as swiftly as possible.

Game Highlights:

🌟 Dream Factory Management: Dive into the magical world of macarons as you oversee your dream factory. Mix and match colors to create the perfect macarons.

🌟 Customer Satisfaction: Your customers have unique and whimsical macaron cravings. Fulfill their orders with lightning speed and precision to earn rave reviews.

🌟 Assemble the Perfect Line: Organize your assembly lines with precision. Move machines and optimize your workflow to create macarons that delight and dazzle.

🌟 Vivid Macaron Palette: Explore a spectrum of vibrant macaron colors and flavors. From classic favorites to exotic creations, your cafe offers a macaron for every dreamer's palate.

🌟 Dreamy Upgrades: Enhance your dream factory with state-of-the-art machines and equipment. Boost your macaron production efficiency to meet the ever-growing demand.

🌟 Simple Yet Challenging Gameplay: Dive into the delightful and challenging world of macaron crafting. Easy-to-learn touch controls make it accessible to all.

🌟 Dive into the World of Dreams: Immerse yourself in a captivating dream world where macarons take center stage. Discover the secrets of creating these delightful treats.

🌟 Become the Macaron Maestro: Can you master the art of macaron-making and earn a reputation as the Macaron Maestro? Your dream cafe's success depends on your skills!

🌟 Share Your Creations: Show off your colorful macarons and dream factory designs to the world. Share your gameplay and culinary creations with friends and fellow dreamers.

name: Dream Cafe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Step into a dreamy world of macarons and cafe management! Craft colorful delights, satisfy whimsical customers, and become the Macaron Maestro in Dream Cafe. Ready to run your dream factory?
